site.title: L'Ensoleillade - Eco-Friendly Cottage in Dordogne
site.description: Discover L'Ensoleillade, a 19m² eco-friendly cottage with 18m² terrace in the heart of Dordogne. Supports the local permaculture association.

hero.title: L'Ensoleillade
hero.subtitle: Eco-Friendly Cottage in the Heart of Dordogne
hero.description: A 19m² tiny house with 18m² terrace in an exceptional natural setting. Your stay supports the development of our permaculture association.

about.title: A Meaningful Stay
about.subtitle: Permaculture & Biodiversity
about.description: L'Ensoleillade is much more than just accommodation. It's an ecological project that supports and develops our local permaculture association. Environmentally respectful construction, local materials and biodiversity preservation are at the heart of our approach.

location.title: Location & Activities
location.subtitle: Saint-Léon-sur-Vézère, Dordogne
location.description: Located in the heart of Périgord Noir, L'Ensoleillade offers privileged access to Dordogne's treasures.
